name: World War II: First Operation
description:
Story

You play as an Egyptian soldier in the intelligence headquarters, where he was attacked by Italian soldiers, and your first task is to try to liberate the Egyptian intelligence headquarters from their evil, and collect documents related to them

System Requirments:

2 GB RAM (Minimum) 4 GB (Recommended

Processor: Intel® Core™2 E8400 (minimum) IIntel® Core™ i3-6300 (Recommended)

Screen: 800x600 (minimum) 1280x720 (Recommended)

VRAM: 1GB video card with DirectX 9.0 compatible drivers (“GeForce” or better)

OS: Windows 7 (minimum) Windows 10/11 (Recommended)

DirectX Version: Microsoft DirectX® 10.0

Space Required: 505 MB (After Extract The RAR File)
